About me

Hi, I'm Aaron. I work as a software developer; I've been a .NET dev since version 1.0. I make my home in northern California with my wife and two kids. I enjoy playing traditional Irish music on fiddle, octave mandolin, and even tenor banjo. While not working or playing music, I spend much of my free time reflecting on how far right-wing American Fundamentalism has missed the mark.
